title: AI-Based Maker Project Learning: Development of an AI Recycling Classifier

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic physics/programming concepts and fundamental AI terminology
context.additional_context: Digital device (tablet/smartphone) utilization and team-based project space configuration

learning_goals: Learners create a recycling classifier by integrating Arduino with an AI model.
Learners design AI solutions for real-world environmental problem-solving through team collaboration.
Learners evaluate the ethical impacts of AI systems by applying higher-order thinking skills (analysis/evaluation/creation).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
